Class ZText

  • java.lang.Object
    • zlibrary.ZComponent
      • zlibrary.ZEntity
        • zlibrary.ZText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZDrawable

    public class ZText
extends ZEntity
    Class for creating images with text to be displayed.
    Since:
    2015-02-16
    Version:
    1.0 <2015-03-07>
    Author:
    Anton Andren <>

      • ZText

        public ZText(java.lang.String string,
             int x,
             int y,
             int fontSize)
        Constructor for ZText
        Parameters:
        string - - what text to be converted to image
        x - - x position of the text
        y - - y position of the text
        fontSize - - the size of the font

      • ZText

        public ZText(java.lang.String string,
             int x,
             int y,
             int w,
             int h,
             int fontSize,
             java.lang.String delimeter)
        Constructor for setting a cap on the text length, adding delimeter at the end
        Parameters:
        string - - what text to be converted to image
        x - - x position of the text
        y - - y position of the text
        w - - maximum width of the text
        h - - maximum height of the text
        fontSize - - the size of the font
        delimteter - - what to be displayed if maximum w or h was surpassed

    • Method Detail

      • createImageFromString

        private java.awt.Image createImageFromString(java.lang.String s,
                                             int fs)
        Creates the image displaying the text s
        Parameters:
        s - - string to be displayed in the image
        fs - - fontSize to be used
        Returns:
        image to be displayed

      • createImageFromStringWrapped

        private java.awt.Image createImageFromStringWrapped(java.lang.String s,
                                                    int w,
                                                    int h,
                                                    int fs,
                                                    java.lang.String d)
        Creates an image containing the text s (wrapped with delimiter if needed).
        Parameters:
        s - - string to be displayed in the image
        w - - max width of the image
        h - - max height of the image
        fs - - fontSize to be used
        d - - string to be used as delimiter
        Returns:
        image to be displayed
